channel.title: About on Mischa Friegang
channel.description: Recent content in About on Mischa Friegang

item.title: Outdoor Trip Reports
item.description: I enjoy a variety of outdoor activities, but primarily spend my time outside running, hiking, peakbagging, or splitboarding. I’ve also been known to enjoy cycling, both road and mountain, but have been enjoying being on my feet more lately. I’m currently focused on finishing the Tahoe Ogul Peak List, a list of 63 peaks within a few hours of Tahoe. I have been doing these since before I knew the list existed in 2014.

item.title: Tech
item.description: I love technology, its really the primary driver behind this website (I enjoy the infrastructure more than writing posts). You can find some stuff I’ve felt the need to document here, some day I hope to add more content to this section. Hashicorp Vault Network
